item.title: Reply to TagoFabic's tweet at https://twitter.com/TagoFabic/statuses/25828763740/:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Reply to TagoFabic's tweet at https://twitter.com/TagoFabic/statuses/25828763740/:

@TagoFabic am I the only one who has this horribly unreadable gray text on black background in the right panel? #NewTwitter
